title: Result Issue with custom data
body:
Hi!, Thanks for this great work.
I'm facing a result issue when trying to apply the pre-trained model on my custom data.
I preprocessed the data and cropped it using **CRAFT**. Since the contrast of my cropped image was low
So I increased the contrast through some OpenCV technique. 
Then I'm using your model to recognize the text part, But could not get good results.
Here I'm attaching some example data.
![3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32773256/79904648-a3d38100-8432-11ea-9189-8633513cb872.jpg)
![13](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32773256/79904749-d0879880-8432-11ea-96b5-b1ac4a891711.jpg)
![100](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/32773256/79904779-df6e4b00-8432-11ea-96fd-07d222241fb9.jpg)

> Predicted result for the first image is **16300060a**
> For the second image is **f348558840**
> And for the third one, it's **f348652877**

Can anyone suggest some ways to improve the results as I need more accurate texts for my purpose?
Thanks.
